data.text: @PamelaOlnick You mean Barry right, did Andy come back from the dead😮

@csmgamble I loved watching Andy Gibb reaction to Keiths beautiful rendition of, TO LOVE SOMEBODY,  he was thrilled, and honored  by Keiths performance,  I recently listened to Andy performing the same song in the 70s,  also beautiful.
@csmgamble Yes he did , that beautiful voice, I don't believe anyone except Keith Urban  could have done it justice,  what a beautiful man, and he received a standing ovation .
@csmgamble It was a VERY heartfelt performance...#IfIaintgotyou  #Youaintgottobesoblind
